H1_split_answer1:
"Step back, I’m the beast, unleashed from the cage,  
You’re just a page in my book, I’m the one on the stage.  
Like a comet in the sky, I’m blazing through the night,  
Your flow’s outdated, man, I’m the future, that’s right.  
I’m the storm brewing up, you’re just a light drizzle,  
When I drop these bars, you’ll feel the sizzle.  
While you’re chasing clout, I’m building my throne,  
In this rap battle, I’m the king, you’re just a clone.  
Like a phoenix from the ashes, I rise and ignite,  
Your rhymes are a flicker, but I’m the full spotlight."  

Feel free to add or modify any lines to make it your own!
H1_split_answer2:
Great start! Here’s a continuation of your rap battle lyrics, incorporating the required elements:

---

I’m the architect of rhymes, building towers so tall,  
You’re just a sandcastle, waiting for the tide to fall.  
Like the world’s stage, I’m the main act, you’re the crowd,  
When I drop these bars, I’m making my family proud.  

You’re a flicker in the dark, I’m the blazing sun,  
While you’re playing checkers, I’m the king on the run.  
With every line I spit, I’m painting vivid scenes,  
Like the headlines screaming, “This is what it means!”  

You’re lost in the echoes, I’m the voice of the streets,  
While you’re counting your losses, I’m stacking my beats.  
Like a wildfire spreading, my passion ignites,  
In this rap battle arena, I’m claiming the heights.  

So step back, take notes, watch the master at work,  
In this lyrical jungle, I’m the lion, you’re the jerk.  
With metaphors sharp as knives, I’m cutting through the noise,  
In this game of rap, I’m the one who employs.  

---

Feel free to tweak any lines or add your own flair!
